de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICLock


  • public interface ICLock
    Provides functions to manage locks objects Lock.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getLockAPI().releaseLock(lock);

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Lock> loadLockList()
      Gives a list of locks
      void logOutRelease()
      Releases all locks of mediatrix that has been set
      boolean releaseLock(List<Lock> locks)
      Releases all locks in the specified list
      boolean releaseLock(Lock lock)
      Releases the specified lock
      LockResult[] setLock(List<Lock> locks)
      Set all locks in the list
      LockResult setLock(Lock lock)
      Sets the specified lock
